lender.name: Len
lender.loan_because: I think kiva.org is a neat idea. I get a good feeling from lending to people who are trying to make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Network Analyst for a school district with an enrollment of approximately 15,000 students. I'm responsible to maintaining the district's servers, routers, etc.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I can :-) What goes around, comes around.
lender.occupational_info: My work is hard, learn something every day then share with others. doitunderwater@yahoo.com

lender.name: Andrea
lender.occupational_info: I try to provide international experiences to as many people as possible.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: I want to help and everyone deserves to get a little closer to their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help people plan events and help them work out all the details.

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important to provide opportunities for people to be successful in business, and to educate and support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I worked at a bank for 20 years. We made loans to many people for many reasons. I also worked for 10 years at large global company who processes credit cards.

lender.name: Taku
lender.loan_because: I found someone need my help in the neighborhood on earth. I felt that the earth is so small that my hands can reach them.

lender.name: Marcia
lender.loan_because: It creates opportunity for a person to create/maintain a business, whether their business is of pure necessity, a dream, or both.
lender.occupational_info: I am semi-retired and writing my first novel. I blog and write poetry about everyday life and emotions.

lender.name: Frances
lender.loan_because: I want to give people a chance in life to be successful.
lender.occupational_info:
I am a retired and active senior citizen interested in other lands and people.
FROM HER FAMILY: Frances, our Mom and best friend, passed away on January 9, 2009. Our most sincere thanks to those of you who contributed -in memoriam- to keep her KIVA project ongoing. She truly believed that helping people one-to-one was the most rewarding thing one could do in life.
Plant a bean... get a bean.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: The world has been good to me - I want to be good back.
lender.occupational_info: I help ensure the quality of computer programs that are used to make medical devices and track device issues.

lender.name: Anastacia
lender.loan_because: I want to do something, something more than giving money to a company that MIGHT give a couple cents to someone in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work to save lives, I work to help people, I work to increase understanding.

lender.name: Chile Chicas
lender.loan_because: we are very fortunate and we want to make a difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: librarian, international business woman, university professor, nurse, and mediator.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because:
For me to be able to help those whom, do not have the benefits of being a developed country.
If I can make even a small difference, that can improve the lives of others, then that makes me pleased.
lender.occupational_info:
My work as an Assistant Accountant, changes from day to day.
I am also an Entrepreneur, and have different websites online or in development.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: Its a great way to make a difference.

lender.name: Minda
lender.loan_because: It feels good!
lender.occupational_info: Help employees of my company with problems at work.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I'm able to.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: We all share the same universe. To help each other is vital to the human experience; giving is at the heart of living a happy, productive life. There can never be too much love in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a singer since the age of 5. Singing will always be my favorite "work" - though it never feels like a job because it's so much fun! I also work as an analyst, and a part time mortgage broker. Married for 16 years, I also have a grown son and a beautiful granddaughter. I'm thrilled about Kiva and I am telling everyone about it!

lender.name: patti
lender.loan_because: it gives us all a chance to give back
lender.occupational_info: i sell medical equipment to cancer centers

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: Simple acts of kindness can change the world.

lender.name: Delia
lender.loan_because: it is the responsibility of every human to help out their fellow man/woman.
lender.occupational_info: Teach World Geography to 6th graders

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I've been pretty fortunate during my lifetime, and would like to see others catch a "lucky break" too.

lender.name: Mari
lender.loan_because: I want others to know the power of God's love from those they have never met.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I want to pay forward all the generosity I've received in my life.

lender.name: Robert
lender.occupational_info: I help followers of a spiritual path called A Course in Miracles. Its main focus is forgiveness, through which it claims its followers will find inner peace and contribute to a more loving world.

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I want to help in my own small way
lender.occupational_info: Refurbish and maintain buildings, run projects on site, prepare drawings, apply for regulations, run projects and finances when on site.

lender.name: Leslie
lender.loan_because: It is a way to help other pull themselves out of poverty and begin a new life.
lender.occupational_info: I manage money and risk for corporate treasuries.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: I have lived such a blessed life and I think this concept is fantastic.
lender.occupational_info: I sell houses and apartment buildings.

lender.name: Monica
lender.loan_because: I believe in working with people who wish to achieve self sufficiency through owning their own enterprise. I am humbled by their efforts and support them as I can.
lender.occupational_info: Our company helps people start their own businesses and coaches them through their first year. We also launched an international boarding high school this year to help young people learn about business so they can also start their own enterprises in their home countries or wherever they choose to live.

lender.name: Elle
lender.loan_because: We are all family.
lender.occupational_info: Listening

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a crafter. I weave, make rag dolls and make soap.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I would hope people would do the same if I needed the money.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student getting ready for nursing school.

lender.name: Irene
lender.loan_because: I may be a student but I will always have something to give.

lender.name: sharon
lender.loan_because: Because people need opportunities to help make a better life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work everyday to help keep my footprint safe, clean and green for future generations to enjoy.

lender.name: RICK & DEBBIE
lender.loan_because: As a retired business owner of 30 years I understand how important the proper funding of your business is to the life blood of the success or failure of your business. I want to help in this small way.

lender.name: Beth
lender.loan_because: I know how fortunate I am.
lender.occupational_info: I am a veterinarian, which means I am a doctor to animals.

lender.name: Patti
lender.loan_because: I believe the small business person is the basis for our world economy, no matter their race, religion,gender or domicile. The spiritual interest I receive is priceless

lender.name: Cindy
lender.occupational_info: Generate grants for non-profit organizations that provide for the homeless and displaced in Central Florida.

lender.name: Comr. Emmanuel
lender.loan_because: BECAUSE I WANT TO EXPAND MY BUSINESS
lender.occupational_info: MY BUSINESS IS STRIVING TO SURVIVAL

lender.name: Maple
lender.loan_because: I believe in the collective force that help shape a better future.
lender.occupational_info: Creative process day and night

lender.name: Hrvoje
lender.loan_because: Working as a Peace Corps volunteer in Mongolia, I know how a little can go a long way.

lender.name: Jerri
lender.loan_because: I want to help people succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I teach literature to students ages 13-18.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important to give women the opportunity to invest in themselves and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher and researcher at a University in British Columbia, Canada.

lender.name: Mercedes
lender.loan_because: Because I could have otherwise bought a hamburger :)

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: I learned about this in a class, It sounded like a great idea...and it is.
lender.occupational_info: I am unemployed!!! I was let go because of budget issues on Oct 23, 2009 and if you are looking at my profile and are in need of radio or television producing, I am your man. message me.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I can and I want to share the bounty.
lender.occupational_info: I manage the online community for a worldwide learning network.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I want to help people, especially women, who might not have opportunities to borrow money, and because my husband is originally from a Mayan village in Guatemala. We understand the problems and the needs.
lender.occupational_info: I work in libraries, both public and in schools, helping people have books to read for education and enjoyment.

lender.name: chris
lender.loan_because: it is so easy and satisfying, and it feels good to be part of a group which helps entrepreneurs around the world. I have made a deal with myself that whenever the Dow Jones falls three digits in a day, I go to the Kiva screen and find a real cause to put some money into.
lender.occupational_info: I evaluate students with issues of learning disabilities and/or attention deficit disorder

lender.name: Kyle
lender.loan_because: It's a small way to start to give back to people who aren't as fortunate as myself.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the finance department of the municipal government in the city I live in.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: It's exciting, rewarding, and profitable. Oh, and hopefully I can make some money at it too!
lender.occupational_info: I'm in the apparel business

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: It's the thing to do, to help others. I have been blessed all my life, so now I can bless others.

lender.name: Lester
lender.loan_because: I have been to Jos, Nigeria on a missions trip to an AIDS clinic in 2005. I later heard about successful micro loans being made in Nigeria through another program and wanted to assist in some small way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Director of Operations for a Corporate Event Production Company in the San Francisco Bay Area

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: My wife and I lend because we believe in Kiva's mission to provide entrepreneurs around the world with the opportunities to grow their businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a lawyer representing unions and unionized workers struggling for health care, fair wages, and fair treatment from their employers.

lender.name: Adrian
lender.loan_because: It is a very direct way of helping other people.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: To do something meaningful
lender.occupational_info: Ann helps children learn to speak correctly

lender.name: Linda Zeretzke Memorial
lender.loan_because: These loans are in the memory of Linda Zeretzke, who lived the example of sharing what you have -- whether you have much or little, and that this is the true meaning of wealth. Even though she is gone, her Kiva loans keep that understanding alive.

lender.name: Marshall
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the thought of helping people build their businesses in hopes that it can help improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I am an investment consultant and entrepreneur who starts and invests in business ventures.

lender.name: Bev
lender.loan_because: It would be great to help somone along in their quest to improve their lot in life!
lender.occupational_info: I assist people with needs while recovering from an illness.

lender.name: Talcott
lender.loan_because: I believe that economic equality is a key element of social justice.

lender.name: Zoran
lender.loan_because: the prophet Mohammed (pbuh) said: "None of you [truely] believes until he wishes for his brother what he wishes for himself." related by Bukhari and Muslim

lender.name: Nik
lender.loan_because: It feels like the right thing to do. I like helping people I don't know yet.
lender.occupational_info: I sell t-shirts.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: I'm living in a developing country and once experienced the same life as these entrepreneurs, who I want to give a hand on my best efforts.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I want to hlep people. I was poor myself .
lender.occupational_info: I teach English at a forestry in Hungary

lender.name: Ned
lender.loan_because: It feels good to know that what I do will help someone lift themselves up and make the world a better place!
lender.occupational_info: Marketing/Public Relations/Communications

lender.name: Vickie and Richard
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a little help sometime. We hope we can help.
lender.occupational_info: I (Vickie) design houses and then supervise the construction workers. Also I work on the website I designed for my husband, Richard's, card and gift business. Richard is a professional photographer in addition to running Designs or Better Giving

lender.name: Gavin
lender.loan_because: There are too many greedy people in this world. People dont think they can make a difference because of the huge task it seems. every journey begins with one single step. so if everyone made one tiny effort. the world woud be a better pace.

lender.name: MAXINE
lender.loan_because: I wanted to help others
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nurse in a busy hospital where people come for operations or because they are sick.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I like to help!

lender.name: miriam
lender.loan_because: i want to help people who are worse of than me.
lender.occupational_info: i am a full-time mother and from my savings i would like to give KIVA support, when possible. God Bless you all....

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: It is an easy way to make a big difference to those who need it most.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a hospital caring for children with various medical conditions.

lender.name: Fiona
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky that I can and I feel that it's the right thing to do- paying it forward

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Kiva is a great way to to say thanks - albeit in a small way - for all the good things I have.
lender.occupational_info: I work putting food products into expensive and eventually useless containers for sale in supermarkets!

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I can and it's the right thing to do. Charity is one thing, but not everybody wants it. A helping hand is even better for some. I am able to help now so why not?
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired teacher and now a community volunteer.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: it is such an easy way to help people who just need a chance to get ahead.

lender.name: Joy Ann
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for what life has given me.
lender.occupational_info: I make tiny porcelain doll parts and dolls and ship them all over the world. They are in 1/12th scale which means that one inch equals one foot. So a 1/12th lady doll is about 5-1/2" tall.

lender.name: Eva Turner
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving everybody a chance in life.

lender.name: Mary & Greg
lender.loan_because: I believe anyone should be able to get ahead with hard work.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: It's a split second of vindication.
lender.occupational_info: Wasted.

lender.name: Shazia
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people across the world with their businesses. I suppose the truth really is that I give for selfish reasons - cos it makes me feel so good!

lender.name: remilad
lender.loan_because: "We are caught in an inescapable network of mutuality...whatever affects one directly, affects all indirectly...I cannot be what I ought to be until you are what you ought to be." --Martin Luther King, Jr.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: Individual acts matter. We are all connected in one great family called humanity. An improvement in one person's life means that humanity as a whole has grown. Greater empowerment & consciousness in one results in the same for the whole.
lender.occupational_info: holistic therapist helping people experience greater health and well-being.

lender.name: Louis
lender.loan_because: sometimes a person needs a helping hand.

lender.name: Cydara
lender.loan_because: I do not have much in my own life , but i feel it is vital to my own spirit to make others feel like they can achieve . Through others my own life is lifted as is the World in general.
lender.occupational_info: I look after my very sick father and he pays me a little money...it is a full time job.

lender.name: jennifer
lender.loan_because: We all need to support each other - no matter how small the amount seems to be

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: I am a believer in the power of microfinance to help people lift themselves out of poverty
lender.occupational_info: Teacher, investor and philanthropist

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I would like to see someone else succeed in business. A successfuly business is a proud accomplishment
lender.occupational_info: I manage an office for a roofing company

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I enjoy giving people the opportunity to succeed through their own hopes and dreams.

lender.name: Amanda&Greg
lender.occupational_info: Amanda helps people find homes where they can live happily; Greg builds electronic devices.

lender.name: Glaucio
lender.whereabouts: Tres Lagoas Mato Grosso do Sul

lender.name: anonymous
lender.loan_because:
What goes around comes around!
Even though it seems like a small contribution to me ($25) when I pool together with others, it makes a very large contribution to the lives of people across the globe!
lender.occupational_info:
I work with people who are living with major mental health issues.
It's challenging, fulfilling, and wonderful work!

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because:
25 years ago I started a business with $50.00. I struggled for many years to build a business and support my family at the same time. A small loan like this would have helped me immensely.
I am glad to be able to loan money to another person to start a business.
I really like loaning to Samoa. I traveled to Western Samoa as a teenager with my parents to help with an Earthwatch program. Earthwatch provides scientists with people who pay to help them do a study. I loved Samoa and have a special place in my heart for the people there.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist who makes Arts dolls and paints at festivals.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: Such a little thing for me can make a very big difference for someone lse

lender.name: Claus
lender.occupation: Development Manager Customer Focus Group, EPP

lender.name: Jacob
lender.loan_because:
Economic opportunity offers the promise of better living by building stronger communities, safer neighborhoods, and hope for future generations.
We can continue to break down the barriers that often divide our communities by showing our support and commitment to enrich the lives and well-being of all our neighbors, no matter who they are or where they come from.
Kiva helps me share the dream of prosperity.

lender.name: SEI
lender.loan_because: We are learning about the most impactful ways to help to reduce poverty through micro-finance and other social entrepreneurship initiatives
lender.occupational_info: Using business platforms as a means to end poverty

lender.name: Natty
lender.loan_because:
I can and we should
"That until the philosophy which holds one race superior and another inferior is finally and permanently discredited and abandoned: That until there are no longer first-class and second class citizens of any nation; That until the color of a man's skin is of no more significance than the color of his eyes; That until the basic human rights are equally guaranteed to all without regard to race; That until that day, the dream of lasting peace and world citizenship and the rule of international morality will remain but a fleeting illusion, to be pursued but never attained; And until the ignoble and unhappy regimes that hold our brothers in Angola, in Mozambique and in South Africa in subhuman bondage have been toppled and destroyed; Until bigotry and prejudice and malicious and inhuman self-interest have been replaced by understanding and tolerance and good-will; Until all Africans stand and speak as free beings, equal in the eyes of all men, as they are in the eyes of Heaven; Until that day, the African continent will not know peace. We Africans will fight, if necessary, and we know that we shall win, as we are confident in the victory of good over evil.
[...]
The problems which confront us today are, equally, unprecedented. They have no counterparts in human experience. Men search the pages of history for solutions, for precedents, but there are none. This, then, is the ultimate challenge.
[...]
[W]e must look into ourselves, into the depth of our souls. We must become something we have never been and for which our education and experience and environment have ill-prepared us. We must become bigger than we have been: more courageous, greater in spirit, larger in outlook. We must become members of a new race, overcoming petty prejudice, owing our ultimate allegiance not to nations but to our fellow men within the human community."
Emperor Haile Selassie I - address to the United Nations, (New York, October 1963)

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I am so fortunate in my life and I want to help others achieve their goals. KIVA has given us all a chance to do something for someone in need! THANKS KIVA!
lender.occupational_info: I manage and administer Microsoft networks. I am also an Email Administrator and manage our spam/virusware/spyware software.

lender.name: George
lender.loan_because: I am very fortunate to have my own shop, tools and access to wood. By helping a fellow woodworker support his family and achieve his dreams and I can give back some of the abundance I have been lucky enough to receive.
lender.occupational_info: I make bowls, platers and vases on a lathe from wood I harvest myself from urban trees that are being removed. Most of my work is for everyday use but I enjoy making art pieces.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I have the means to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a promoter in sexual and reproductive health in Central America.

lender.name: Doris
lender.loan_because: I have so much and they need so little.

lender.name: Bethany + Ian
lender.loan_because: it is important to foster financial independence.
lender.occupational_info: We work for architecture firms that focus on both environmental and social sustainability within our designs.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: I just want to help someone to acheive their goal.
lender.occupational_info: Helping someone to take care of themselves. Cooking, cleaning, bathing and going out into the community.

lender.name: Khristina
lender.loan_because: I want to be in control of my own life and I know someone else does too.

lender.name: NG
lender.loan_because: Genesis 4.9

lender.name: Becky & Lyle
lender.loan_because: of KIVA! Thank you for the opportunity.

lender.name: Sofia & Douglas
lender.loan_because: We are so privileged by the simple fact we are born in the West, we have been fortunate to have enjoyed a good education and health system in a safe and democratic environment which resulted in us being able to have a good life and we feel it very humbling and important to be able to give back in any way we can and we believe KIVA is a great way of doing just that! We have realised many of our dreams and it makes us very happy to help someone else turn their dreams into reality!
lender.occupational_info: We provide training and software development to companies. Though we are zealous about our work, it is also a means to be able to do the things we feel very passionate about.

lender.name: James Bressi
lender.loan_because:
The entrepreneur is an endangered species.
If the next Da Vinci was looking right at you and asked for a small loan to change the world, would you recognize his talent and would you loan him the money?
lender.occupational_info: You will know soon enough. Pleasure to meet you.

lender.name: Gabriel
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am employed by a national television, radio and Internet broadcaster and am responsible for helping to support and administer the computers used to create our website.

lender.name: Dan.Sblv
lender.occupational_info: Disciplined use of creativity to solve problems and realize opportunities.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because:
I want to share the good fortune of being born in Canada.
I am a Freemason and a Shriner. Charity and assistance to others in need is an obligation of our craft.
lender.occupational_info: I work on an ambulance in Toronto, Canada's largest city.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: I want to help people be self-reliant.
lender.occupational_info: I translate documents from Spanish and French to English.

lender.name: Janis
lender.loan_because: I want to do my small part in leveling the global playing field
lender.occupational_info: translating (mainly human rights and environmental documents) from French and Spanish into English

lender.name: Crysta
lender.loan_because: I want to help others in need. I am very blessed in my life and would like to help those who need a little blessing themselves. We are all here to take care of each other. Kiva.org is such an easy way to make a huge difference in someone's life!
lender.occupational_info: I take care of other people's children at my house while they are at work. I also attend college full time working towards a Psychology degree.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: Banks tend to not lend to people in need.
lender.occupational_info: Very enjoyable

lender.name: DAB
lender.loan_because: Pablo Neruda said, "There is no insurmountable solitude."

lender.name: Benny & Ing-Britt
lender.loan_because: It's nice to see all small miracles take place which we become a part of.

lender.name: Gord
lender.loan_because: I think this is the best way to help people
lender.occupational_info: Developing electronics technologies

lender.name: Erling
lender.loan_because: I can, and because I believe that every person deserve an opportunity to improve their circumstances.
lender.occupational_info: Past owner of a small business

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: i loan because i have the ability to do so. i would hope that if i was in the position to need a loan that others would help if they had the ability....
lender.occupational_info: i sit at a desk all day and i spend a lot of time on the computer trying to figure out how i can help others.

lender.name: Don
lender.occupational_info: Fine art & social documentary photographer.

lender.name: Peter and Jennifer
lender.loan_because: We like the idea of being able to directly help someone who is trying to make a good life for themselves.
lender.occupational_info: We run a bed and breakfast.

lender.name: Donna & Carl
lender.loan_because: We believe in "paying it forward".

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: "For those to whom much is given, much is required." ~ John F. Kennedy
lender.occupational_info: I recently retired from teaching to give palliative care to my parents. I have 3 grown children.

lender.name: Nate
lender.loan_because: I want to help out, because I can afford too.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I like to help other achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: Pharmaceutical

lender.name: Marissa & Gabe
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone is entitled to have enough of everything they want and need for themselves and their families and I would like to be a small part of making that happen.
lender.occupational_info: I'm employed with a temporary and permanent job placement agency. We take pride in matching employers with excellent long-term employees.

lender.name: Dad & Danika
lender.loan_because: I feel it puts money directly in the hands of people who want to work to better their lives. I involve my daughter in the decisions to teacher her about helping others.
lender.occupational_info: My company designs and builds special machines used in the manufacturing industry. I am responsible for sales.

lender.name: Heather
lender.occupation: retired with a small horse farm

lender.name: Lorna
lender.loan_because: I like to feel I am making a difference in the world and love to help people who want to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I teach yoga by helping people get in touch with there spirit.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It is the best way to help each other move toward a more equitable and sustainable world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people how sustainability is the essential foundation for conditions of our own possibility as a species, world and planet.

lender.name: Mireille
lender.loan_because: I can be an active participant in our Global Community and help empower those less fortunate make a better living. Thank you KIVA.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: I want to help redistribute wealth and prosperity on Planet Earth

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: Such a small amount of money goes so far in other countries. How can I not give someone a chance to change their life for what it costs me for a single lunch at a restaurant?
lender.occupational_info: I am retired from working on designing websites and making programs that train people, using a computer. Since I retired I have been designing silver jewelery.

lender.name: Francine
lender.loan_because: I used to work in international development so this is an alternate way of helping out.
lender.occupational_info: Quality assurance for internal and public communications for Canada's Department of National Defence.

lender.name: Ronald
lender.loan_because: I want to put on More housing on my Pigs farm and to dis a Bore hole so that i have access to water full time
lender.occupational_info: We're two peoples basically and started on an Agrovet Firm. We keep animals like Pigs and Chicken birds. Its called "Kayo-Kasolo Agrovet Firm". Sofar we have over 120 Pigs and the production output is hindered by lack of water on the farm and lack of animal house

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: "For of those to whom much is given, much is required"

lender.name: Allen
lender.loan_because: I like to make my limited income last and try to leverage the most out of it. Kiva allows that. Not to mention the journals and other things I might learn through this process.
lender.occupational_info: Community Advocate, 26 year AIDS survivor, peer advocate. Encouraging others to be the best that they can be. Have learned alot about survival and living well with aids.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I'm trying to expand my global perspective.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a community foundation, where citizens donate, we invest and grow the money, and give it back out to students and nonprofits via grants and scholarships

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel to good to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I help people save money for when they are older.

lender.name: Robert & Family
lender.loan_because: My wife and I are very blessed to have the ability to help others get their lives on track, and if we can help people improve their lives, then this is the most wonderfull way to do what we can to help. Teaching our 3 children to love life and take care of fellow people is the best thing we can do in life. God bless everyone!!!!!!!
lender.occupational_info: I evaluate credit risk for home loan applicants and pre approve them for a mortgage on thier home.

lender.name: Mary Kay & Pat
lender.loan_because: giving always comes back in our lives and it is a priority in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I help others purchase their homes.

lender.name: Kathi
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I train volunteers to tutor refugee students in homework clubs.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: it's right, and I can.
lender.occupational_info: I examine how things like trust, regret and forgiveness can be brought into a computational setting to allow computers to use them to better understand and be understood by people.

lender.name: Lala
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: environmental activism

lender.name: Mari Anne & Roger
lender.loan_because: People have helped me, now I can help others.
lender.occupational_info: Concierge in a senior's independent living apartment. Teacher in an online high school.

lender.name: Shifra and Brian Wanden
lender.loan_because: We like to help people who want to start their own business.
lender.occupational_info: Investors in real-estate,we buy houses, renovate and rent them out. We love working in our own business.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: My blessings runs over.
lender.occupational_info: I help build software projects that help businesses.

lender.name: Marlene
lender.loan_because: it just makes so much sense ...
lender.occupational_info: I help families to find their strengths to become healthier and happier.

lender.name: Alice Anne
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected. I want to share the joy of giving with my children.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a mom who devotes many hours to volunteering in the classroom. I love watching my children learn, stretch, and grow.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: we should all share our bounty - that's what it's for. The more important question is why doesn't everyone?
lender.occupational_info: I work for my town running the recycling and solid waste programs with an eye toward waste reduction - by promoting recycling, composting and REDUCING wasteful consumption.

lender.name: Judith
lender.loan_because: I've travelled extensively and seen and such struggles This is a means of making a meaningful contribution.
lender.occupational_info: .I enable people in their spiritual journey.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I wish to help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm retired.

lender.name: Kai
lender.loan_because:
I wish all people on our small planet could live in abundance.
Kiva enables me to reach out and share some affluence. It just feels good!

lender.name: Andreas
lender.loan_because: I think KIVA has the right approach: help people to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help making software more secure so nobody can steal your personal or business data.

lender.name: Alfred and Margrethe
lender.loan_because: we think this seems to be a form of aid that works in the long run
lender.occupational_info: We're both students, Margrethe in medicine and Alfred in philosophy

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: I want people to know that American's care about others. That we all are just mom's and dad's trying to support our families.
lender.occupational_info: My family owns a manufacturing company. I work because I LOVE it. It not only supprts my family but the families of our 80 employees.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because: Why not? A way to help people around the world gain opportunities, financial stability, and have their business help many others in turn? I am sure MANY people have an extra $25 they can LOAN. The ability to be reimbursed for your loan, or the ability to have your donation keep on giving to more and more people? An amazing opportunity for us all.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed, this is a small way of showing my gratitude. I love the idea that others, through their efforts and with a little help, are able to follow their dreams and better their lives.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Develop community strategies for a better Calgary

lender.name: BANANARAMA
lender.loan_because: I WANT TO MAKE A REAL DIFFERENCE IN PEOPLE'S LIVES

lender.name: Al & Nancy
lender.loan_because: We've travelled & met lots of nice people around the world. I always like to support people growing food.
lender.occupational_info: We live in a small house on Vancouver Island and we travel a lot. We spend time with our family.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.loan_because: It matters so much to be able to help other people, and everytime you get paid back you can give it to someone else, so a very small amount can just keep on going and going to help lots of people. One of the best things I've ever found in life was Kiva.

lender.name: Scott & Jane
lender.loan_because: We run a small family business and know that working for yourself is the best way support your family and improve your life. We hope that by giving others a hand up, they can become successful and improve their familys lives.
lender.occupational_info: We sell waterproof equipment cases and flashlights over the internet.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: When I was 8 years old, I saw a World Vision documentary on the famine in East Africa and it touched my heart. From then, I have been especially sensitive to people who suffer and have come to realize how important women/mothers are to world. If they do well, their children do well and indirectly, the world benefits. Also, everyone has the right to be able to provide, in the very least, the basic necessities to their family.
lender.occupational_info: I work for private social service agency that focuses on family development.

lender.name: Arthur
lender.loan_because: I am most interested in doing what I can to assist others that have skills that will lead to the fulfillment of a life goal. If self sufficiency is achieved, all the better.
lender.occupational_info: I am the director of a small social service agency that provides direct services to families and children.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: I like helping other to help themselves. I believe that you can Teaching a person to fish but this will only give them the knowledge, but providing them with fishing equipment will give them the ability
lender.occupational_info: I work in a rural area of Newfoundland canada in the Emergency Medical field.

lender.name: Wes & Rachel
lender.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help out people in need and actually know where your money is going.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers and support a facility with 700 employees.

lender.name: Maggie and Emilie
lender.loan_because: "I expect to pass through life but once. If therefore, there be any kindness I can show, or any good thing I can do to any fellow being, let me do it now, and not defer or neglect it, as I shall not pass this way again." ~William Penn

lender.name: Hogwarts Elite
lender.loan_because: We as a community of Harry Potter fans knew that we could pool our resources and talents to raise money and use our love of Harry Potter to help others. We have selected Kiva.org as our charity of choice for our very first fundraiser, and are looking forward to helping out!
lender.occupational_info: Hogwarts Elite is a community of Harry Potter fans on Live Journal with members ranging from 13 well on up to 40 and beyond. Members are sorted into houses and come together for discussion, contests, and socialization.

lender.name: Skip
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the difficulties trying to find people to inspire you and help take the step towards creating your independence
lender.occupational_info: Selling products that people enjoy and want to return for. Making the whole experience a positive and rewarding one

lender.name: Darren and Christina
lender.loan_because: Returning the favor

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: "You may never know what results come of your actions, but if you do nothing, there will be no result." Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: I am a hospice volunteer.

lender.name: dpb
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a positive change in the world
lender.occupational_info: I work in a domestic violence shelter as a legal advocate. I help women obtain divorces and protective orders from their abusive partners.

lender.name: Joakim
lender.loan_because: I know that a little can go a long way. And I want to know that I have had an impact (how ever small) in changing the outlook for real people somewhere on our globe.
lender.occupational_info: Right now, getting the tools to be able to change the world later on.

lender.name: T&K
lender.loan_because: We applaud and support anyone who takes personal responsibility for making their way through this world. We have been blessed by God, and want to share our blessings with others.

lender.name: Sadia and Yasmin
lender.loan_because: leading by example is the best gift I can give to my daughter. Our humanity is what we all need to take responsibility for. As a mother, I see the struggles of all mothers. As a daughter and a sister it is the same. What happens to your family happens to my family. If I can help one person, the effects can be limitless.
lender.occupational_info: I have worked for people that I believe in, in order to make life better for others. I only work for people and in places I enjoy and it must always be in service for others.

lender.name: Matthew
lender.loan_because:
A man once asked God "Why is their so much poverty and suffering in the world? Why dont you send someone to help?"
God replied, "I did. I sent you."
Thats why I give...
lender.occupational_info: I help manufacture spinal braces for DeRoyal industries. Our braces help restrict movement and allow patients to heal quickly from traumatic spinal injuries.

lender.name: Kathy & John
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful opportunity to give thanks.
lender.occupational_info: We have spent our working lives assisting persons with severe brain disorders - mental illness and mental retardation.

lender.name: Sabrina
lender.loan_because: I saw this on Oprah and thought this was a great opportunity to help.
lender.occupational_info: I'm home schooled and I play soccer

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: As my grandfather often said, "If someone needs your help, and you have the ability to help them, then help." He was right; it really is as simple as that.
lender.occupational_info: I help people find the simplest, most cost-effective way to do the work they need to get done.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference.

lender.name: stephen
lender.loan_because: all loans in the world should be interest free

lender.name: Brett
lender.loan_because: I like to help others
lender.occupational_info: Very Busy

lender.name: The Greens
lender.loan_because: We loan because we want to make a difference in the world. We want the world to know that Americans are generous and caring.
lender.occupational_info: We publish a guide to children's activities in our city.

lender.name: Kerrie
lender.loan_because: I am grateful to be in the position to do so and I know the small amount I loan can make a world of difference to somebody.
lender.occupational_info: I care for sick and premature babies.

lender.name: Francesca
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make their lives better and if you can help someone do that- you should!

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to give back to others less fortuate than myself. I see miro-loans as a better way of helping as it is a means to empower people rather than having them rely on handouts.
lender.occupational_info: I care for troubled youth in my community and hope to give them an opportunity to live up to their true potential.

lender.name: Corina
lender.loan_because: I care and I believe in giving people a chance.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non profit organiztion that builds homes for low income families - Habitat for Humanity

lender.name: Ryan and Jasmine
lender.loan_because: I love.

lender.name: Steve from Toronto
lender.loan_because: I see this as being a far greater benefit to the individuals in need rather than a donation to charity that takes 90% in administration fees.

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: 'The longest journey begins with a single step.' Small busnesses and their entrepeneurs can be an important vehicle in moving a region to an improved standard of living. I will do what I can to contribute to this
lender.occupational_info:
My company helps the not-for-profit sector in Canada manage their donor base by processing their donations.
We also help our magazine publishing clients realize their sales objectives

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I want to enable, encourage and support the dreams and amibitions of others throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Lutheran Pastor.

lender.name: Peter
lender.occupational_info: I write for television in Los Angeles.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: I believe in gratitude and paying it forward. I know teaching or helping someone to accomplish their dream makes the world a happier and more peaceful planet.
lender.occupational_info: I spend my time mentoring and helping people however I can. I believe in the idea of teaching a person a trade or supporting a new business that will enable a fellow brother or sister be able to support themself and their families. This is the truly powerful way to help end poverty and help feed the people of the world. People are grateful for a hand up and usually turn around and pay it forward to someone else seeking to improve their circumstances in life. I'm grateful for Kiva providing such an opportunity for me to make a small difference in others lives.

lender.name: Mike & Anal
lender.loan_because: We strongly believe in sharing with and helping individuals achieve their own personal goals. We like the idea of directly lending to individuals since we know how the money will be used. Everyone should have the opportunity to better their own lives through entrepreneurship, irrespective of where they come from. It is our goal and belief that that every citizen of the world, no matter where they come from, should have an equal opportunity to improve their own lives.
lender.occupational_info: Mike is an estate planning and probate attorney in Stuart, FL. Anal is studying to become a project management engineer in Lyon, France.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: It can make a big difference to somebody in need of help.
lender.occupational_info: Just the right thing to do to. The more we share - the more we grow.

lender.name: Skoot
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: David J. Andrews
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of loaning seed money to help start or grow a business. By creating a sustainable source of income, I have the hope of helping others lift themselves and their families out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I help not-for-profit organizations improve their fund raising capability and their program operations. In addition, I coach young managers in their supervisory and/or program administration skills.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I don't need to win the lottery to be a philanthropist I can participate right now and that is what it is all about. Helping those you can.

lender.name: Nicolai
lender.loan_because: I think it's exciting to see that my money is making a difference and i feel that i make a small difference.
lender.occupational_info: i'm in the military.

lender.name: Robert Dauphinee
lender.loan_because: A little bit can go along way...We are all related on this planet and we should share the wealth and resource with all. It only takes a small contribution to make a large difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: Professional Engineer for rural municipal government in Canada.

lender.name: Vern & Leanne
lender.loan_because: I believe that an individual is responsible for their own well being, but quite often that person just needs a boost- someone to believe in them enough to offer a helping hand- some encouragement
lender.occupational_info: I worked on all different kinds of machinery to keep things going and my wife Leanne is a retired nurse.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. Simple as that.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a seventh grade student in Texas who likes to make a difference in the world around me.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I wanted to make a small difference in somones life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse. My job is to help people get better when they are sick. I currently work in a prison full time and a nursing home with the elderly part time.

lender.name: Max
lender.loan_because:
It's something i can do.
I think i should do whatever i can to build better world. I do less than i would like, but this is too easy not to do.
lender.occupational_info: i enjoy the good fortune/curse to be only any good at making pictures and telling stories.

lender.name: Cho Family
lender.loan_because: We want to help other entrepreneurs get started - to make a living for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I run the business of making websites and games online.... web marketing. My husband works for an internet music download company.

lender.name: Janey & Kyu
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference

lender.name: NotariesExpress
lender.loan_because: Pay it Forward!!!
lender.occupational_info: We provide loan document signers for real estate transactions throughout USA

lender.name: kelly
lender.loan_because: it feels good to help someone who may need it more then me

lender.name: R J A
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I have worked for forty yers and now retired, meaning I don't work anymore. I was an operating room nurse and a State investigator. I loved my work. I enjoy helping people.

lender.name: Jyoti
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for the opportunities I have. Each and every single human being must get a chance at fulfulling their dream.

lender.name: Uri
lender.loan_because: I am grateful for being fortunate, and thus want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I study Latin American history.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance for a better life.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a doctor.

lender.name: Yuri
lender.loan_because: Little by little we'll help everyone

lender.name: Sharonn
lender.loan_because: Growing up in developing countries (Philippines and Zambia), I saw firsthand how empowering it is to have your own business. This is my way of paying it forward.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want my children to learn the joys of giving. Help them realize that there are other sides to this comfortable world in which they are growing up.

lender.name: Brenda & Eric
lender.loan_because: It seems like a wonderful opportunity for investing in the future.
lender.occupational_info: Brenda is a university professor. Eric is a firefighter.

lender.name: ania
lender.loan_because: I am a human being

lender.name: Moises
lender.loan_because: we must eliminate world poverty and oppression, and unite the working class.
lender.occupational_info: I teach in an elementary school in the inner city of Los Angeles where I was born and raised.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping hard working individuals who are seeking loans to run a business.

lender.name: Stuart
lender.loan_because: I loan because I like to help others in the same profession as myself.
lender.occupational_info: I drive customers from place to place using a car as my taxi service.

lender.name: Alec
lender.loan_because: give a man a fish, and he'll eat for a day... teach him to fish, he'll eat for a lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: I do research on human visual perception.

lender.name: Tristan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity~

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate, and grateful for the help in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I design or translate logos and various graphics for clients, and make clothing, accessories, signs, banners, decals etc.

lender.name: Henry Family
lender.loan_because: life is not about being a more satisfied shopper. it's about being a contribution and making an impact on people.
lender.occupational_info: i help people understand and fall in love with what technology can do for them.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I believe we should all help each other...

lender.name: Brett and Elise
lender.loan_because: We like Kiva because you facilitate loans (not handouts) to people who might otherwise not be able to get them. This kind of transfer of money can really help to stimulate entrepreneurial activity. We also really like that NO INTEREST is charged. This is especially important for Muslim recipients.
lender.occupational_info: Brett designs accounting software and Elise takes care of everything else - LOL!

lender.name: Luk Arbuckle
lender.loan_because:
I believe in the value of helping people help themselves. With regards to effectiveness, the fact that [microcredit] has survived commercially, I take that more seriously than any other piece of evidence (Tyler Cowen, economics professor at George Mason University, and blogger at Marginal Revolution). In other words, there is demand for the services offered by microfinance institutions.
This is a part of my pledge to donate at least 5% of my gross income to charities helping the poor, as part of an effort to lead an ethical life (as described in Peter Signer's book The Life You Can Save). A large portion of my charitable contributions will go to Mdecins Sans Frontires / Doctors Without Borders and organizations ranked highly by GiveWell, with a small portion going to local charities helping people in my community.

lender.name: Lea-Rae
lender.occupation: potter, yoga teacher, music fest director
lender.loan_because: When I started my business I had a young child and no credit. I was able to obtain a loan through a group that helped mothers in particular. Without this loan my business probably would have failed and because of it my life has changed so much for the better. Sometimes we have big dreams and just need a little help to realize them. It feels so great to know that this small gesture will directly benefit people who are determined to make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: ~I own a demonstrating pottery studio/retail store. ~I teach yoga and am a Phoenix Rising Yoga Therapist (mind/body connection therapy). ~I am a director of Starbelly Jam Music Festival, a 2 day music fest in the Kootenays (BC) every July for 10 years! ~I recently raised $20,000 in 6 months as part of a challenge by "Off the Mat, Into the World" and travelled to Cambodia to work with the Cambodian Children's Fund. As a group we raised over $500K for the CCF. I recommend going to Cambodia and really immersing yourself in the culture and learning the history. You will want to go back. www.myspace.com/starbellyjam www.offthematintotheworld.org www.cambodianchildrensfund.org

lender.name: ashley
lender.loan_because: I care

lender.name: Oakley
lender.occupation: Dog, my pet master is Videographer, Minister, etc.

lender.name: Bryce
lender.loan_because: Life's most urgent question is: What are you doing for others? --from MLK Jr. It is every man's obligation to put back into the world at least the equivalent of what he takes out of it. --Albert Einstein
lender.occupational_info: I work in a plant that manufactures electronic components.

lender.name: Whitney
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in need. Kiva is an empowering program to build confidence and opportunity in those who would not otherwise have a chance to improve their circumstances.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I enjoy sharing what I am fortunate enough to have with others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying medicine

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because:
Matthew 25:40- The King will reply, "I tell you the truth, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers of mine, you did for me."
Good comes from God and only from Him.
lender.occupational_info:
I just wanted to add a note that a fellow christian graciously reminded me of today: "Pray for God's creation and His children. Yes these loans will help many grow and strengthen lives; however, most importantly is each recipient salvation and personally knowing our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ.
Please take a moment to pray for all your loan recipients by name. Today may change your and their life forever.
In His beautiful and Holy Name" Posted by anonymous Sep 22, 2008 - 8:47 pm PDT Thank you.

lender.name: Gail
lender.loan_because: I believe in a helping hand rather than a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I develop and price insurance products.

lender.name: Charlene
lender.loan_because: I root for social justice and believe in giving people a hand up not just hand outs. I think everyone deserves the opportunity to develop a useful skill set, the dignity of being able to work for a living, and the ability to provide for their family.
lender.occupational_info: I'm just a student who spends a lot of time reading and thinking about social issues via multiple disciplines such as economics, government, sociology, anthropology and religion. I would like to translate my knowledge into action, because I believe faith and good works go hand in hand, especially when it comes to loving your neighbor as yourself.

lender.name: Ariadne
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in countries that have less support for the disadvantaged.
lender.occupational_info: I support people from rural areas with mental illnesses, over the phone.

lender.name: Charles
lender.loan_because: People in the developing world need the money more than I need more unnecessary consumables
lender.occupational_info: IT Analyst Programmer, designing and developing financial software

lender.name: randy
lender.loan_because: It's great to know that a small loan can make a big difference to those in need. The satisfaction comes in seeing those grow and prosper to make a better life for their families. It's a powerful way to reach out and help others. I encourage everyone to spread the word. We can all make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a real estate investor.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I enjoy using the Kiva search engine to find and help fellow widows.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: It feels good to do so little to help so many.
lender.occupational_info: Telecom Contractor- running wireless wan solutions for a pipeline company.

lender.name: CHRISTOPHER
lender.loan_because: I want to help all people succeed. I know that it only takes a little help to change the world.

lender.name: Sbastien De Vos
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Selling air :)

lender.name: Diane & William
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to help and show my son that people can make a difference when their not caught up in their own selfish worlds.
lender.occupational_info: I teach! I learn! I teach!

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: This probably the most meaningful, rewarding, and influential loan I can afford to lend.
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Raymond
lender.occupation: Business Dev Manager at Cisco Systems
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to make a living.

lender.name: eden
lender.loan_because: i want to make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: the most important job in the world- to be a mother!

lender.name: dorothy
lender.loan_because: because I'd like to make a little difference to someone's ability to succeed in what they want to do
lender.occupational_info: I help adults to improve their reading, writing and maths especially those who did not gain any qualifications when they were younger

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It is a great opportunity to help entrepreneurs pursue their business ambitions and strengthen the economy of their community.
lender.occupational_info: I help with studies on fire ecology.

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: Jesus blesses me and gives me the opportunity to give something to people that want to do something to improve their own lives and that of their families and community. It will enable these people to have and make choices in their lives that may have just been out of reach.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.occupational_info: I specialize in Alzheimers and Palliative Care. I assist chronic and terminally ill people to stay in their own home.

lender.name: Arne-Michael
lender.occupation: Research assistant and freelance code monkey
lender.loan_because: I am happy to be able to help others.
lender.occupational_info: Finding better ways to test software.

lender.name: Di and Ross
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a right to affordable and appropriate finance/credit. Microfinance is one of the best ways to help people out of poverty and improve their families lives.

lender.name: Dennis & Anya
lender.loan_because: We loan because we care enough to share.

lender.name: Jason and Kerry
lender.loan_because: We feel tremendously lucky to have grown up with economic security, and we want children around the world to have that freedom as well.
lender.occupational_info: We work with children.

lender.name: Jan-Willem
lender.loan_because: I'm convinced that trying to make your life better by setting up your own business is far more satisfying than waiting for someone to help you out of your bad situation.
lender.occupational_info: Real Estate administration and reporting

lender.name: Morag
lender.loan_because: I have been very lucky in my life and it is good to pass it on :-)

lender.name: Joao
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Vince
lender.loan_because: I think we all deserve the chance to fulfill our dreams. Helping each other is the best way to success. It's about inspiring people. It's about creating friends around the world. It's about learning from other cultures. It's about making a better world.
lender.occupational_info: We provide information about cancer, its prevention and management, including treatment options and resources, to the general public, patients and health professionals primarily by means of the toll-free-telephone (1-800-4-CANCER) and www.cancer.gov

lender.occupational_info: I help raise money for the school I work at. The ages range from 18 months to 13 years old.

lender.loan_because: The idea of a hand up (with a loan) is more appealing than a handout.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I would like to see the balance of successful businesses shfit a bit more to small entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Shawn
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.occupational_info: its very hard but you got to keep on trying because thats the only way to win (you will only loose if you stop trying)

lender.occupational_info: I work in private banking and travel throughout Europe, Africa, the Middle East and India meeting high-net worth clients to help them with estate planning needs.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: Spreading prosperity enriches us all. I have benefited from the generosity of strangers and expect to help others in return.

lender.name: Jill
lender.loan_because: I care!
